name: Container
description: The Container class represents the file wich contain this file

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the file system object, not including the path.

path.name: path
path.description: The full path to the file system object, including the name.  The path name should be represented in as "universal" a manner as possible, to facilitate processing of the alert.

File.name: File
File.description: A <File> element may be used in place of the <name> and <path> elements if additional information about the file is to be included.
